articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy, Robert Brand
articles.title: US-China Trade Deal Optimism Boosts Risk Assets: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The record-breaking stocks rally faltered as investors parsed a flurry of corporate earnings, while awaiting results from US megacap technology companies as well as a Federal Reserve policy decision.
articles.content: The record-breaking stocks rally faltered as investors parsed a flurry of corporate earnings, while awaiting results from US megacap technology companies as well as a Federal Reserve policy decision.… [+361 chars]
